items.common_usage_cn: 用于计算英雄的伤害、生命值、魔法值等战斗属性，常见于属性关联的技能效果实现

items.name: Attributes
items.description_cn: 定义英雄的三种基础属性类型
items.common_usage_cn: 用于获取/设置英雄的力量/敏捷/智力属性值

items.name: CLICK_BEHAVIORS
items.description_cn: 定义单位对不同点击事件的响应行为类型
items.common_usage_cn: 用于控制单位对玩家鼠标点击的交互响应，如移动、攻击、施法等

items.name: ConVarFlags

members.name: FCVAR_HIDDEN
members.description_cn: 不在自动补全和帮助中显示

members.name: FCVAR_PROTECTED
members.description:
Makes the ConVar value hidden from all clients (for example sv_password).
Reported as "prot" by cvarlist.

members.name: FCVAR_SPONLY
members.description:
Executing the command or changing the ConVar is only allowed in singleplayer.
Reported as "sp" by cvarlist.

members.name: FCVAR_ARCHIVE
members.description:
Save the ConVar value into config.cfg.
Reported as "a" by cvarlist, except Lua ConVars.

members.name: FCVAR_NOTIFY
members.description:
For serverside ConVars, notifies all players with blue chat text when the value gets changed.
Reported as "nf" by cvarlist.

members.name: FCVAR_USERINFO
members.description:
For clientside commands, sends the value to the server.
Reported as "user" by cvarlist.

members.name: FCVAR_UNLOGGED
members.description:
Don't log the ConVar changes to console/log files/users.
Reported as "log" by cvarlist.

members.name: FCVAR_REPLICATED
members.description:
For serverside ConVars, it will send its value to all clients. The ConVar with the same name must also exist on the client!
Reported as "rep" by cvarlist.
members.description_cn: 从服务器同步到客户端

members.name: FCVAR_CHEAT
members.description:
Requires sv_cheats to be enabled to change the ConVar or run the command.
Reported as "cheat" by cvarlist.

members.name: FCVAR_DEMO
members.description:
Force the ConVar to be recorded by demo recordings.
Reported as "demo" by cvarlist.

members.name: FCVAR_DONTRECORD
members.description:
Opposite of FCVAR_DEMO, ensures the ConVar is not recorded in demos.
Reported as "norecord" by cvarlist.

members.name: FCVAR_NOT_CONNECTED
members.description: Makes the ConVar not changeable while connected to a server or in singleplayer.

items.description_cn: 用于定义和控制台变量(ConVar)行为相关的标志位枚举
items.common_usage_cn: 用于配置服务器/客户端控制台变量的访问权限和行为特性

members.name: DAMAGE_TYPE_HP_REMOVAL

members.name: DAMAGE_TYPE_ABILITY_DEFINED
members.description_cn: 由技能自定义的特殊伤害类型
